mapper.select: SELECT TCO_NOPEN, TCO_NCLOSE, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(TCO_NOPEN) TCO_NOPEN_MIN2HHMI, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(TCO_NCLOSE) TCO_NCLOSE_MIN2HHMI FROM TMG_COMPANY WHERE TCO_CCUSTOMERID = #{custCode} AND TCO_CCOMPANYID = #{compCode} AND TCO_DSTARTDATE <= TO_DATE(#{targetDate} , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TCO_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE(#{targetDate} , 'YYYY/MM/DD')
